item.title: ‘Destiny 2’ Is Un-Nerfing ‘Edge Of Fate’ Nerfs A Month Early
item.description: A nerf that was going to happen in Destiny 2's The Edge of Fate has now been un-nerfed well before release thanks to complaining.

item.title: A Great Update About ‘The Pitt’ Season 2’s Release Date
item.description: We have an update on the release date of The Pitt season 2 on HBO Max, and it's very promising for those waiting for its return.

item.title: OnePlus 13s Blends OnePlus X Pocketability With OnePlus 13 Power
item.description: The OnePlus 13s is a refreshingly new compact phone that offers flagship prowess and big battery in a smaller form factor.
